name: claude-code-plugins
description: Modular Claude Code plugin system — 7 domain plugins covering frontend, backend, mobile, DevOps, quality, devtools, and core infrastructure

plugins.name: claude-core
plugins.description: Foundation plugin — hooks, rules, core skills (implement, planning, onboarding), explorer agent. Required by all other plugins.

plugins.name: claude-frontend
plugins.description: UI domain — frontend/i18n agents, component/styling/UI/accessibility/performance/SEO skills, i18n hardcoded string check hook.

plugins.name: claude-backend
plugins.description: API & Data domain — backend/database/security/analytics agents, API/DB/integration/jobs/analytics/monitoring/email/AI skills, Stripe/S3 hooks.

plugins.name: claude-mobile
plugins.description: Mobile domain — mobile agent, Expo/React Native/NativeWind skills, Expo npm install warning hook.

plugins.name: claude-devops
plugins.description: Infrastructure domain — devops agent, release skill, pre-deploy/post-deploy hooks.

plugins.name: claude-quality
plugins.description: QA domain — reviewer agent, quality/bugfix/error-recovery skills. Verification hub for all skills.

plugins.name: claude-devtools
plugins.description: Git & Review domain — review-plan/refactor skills, pre-commit/codex-review hooks.
